parms.name: save_model_as
parms.help: format to save the model (default is .safetensors)

parms.name: max_train_epochs
parms.help: Training epochs (overrides max_train_steps)

parms.name: train_batch_size
parms.help: Batch size for training. Increases VRAM usage.

parms.name: learning_rate
parms.help: Learning rate

parms.name: text_encoder_lr
parms.help: Should be half of learning rate or higher.

parms.name: network_dim
parms.help: Number of dimensions.

parms.name: network_alpha
parms.help: Alpha for Lora weight scaling.

parms.name: save_precision
parms.help: Precision in saved files.

parms.name: save_every_n_epochs
parms.help: Save checkpoint every N epochs

parms.name: v2
parms.help: Enable it for Stable Diffusion v2.0 model (base)

parms.name: v_parameterization
parms.help: Enable it for Stable Diffusion 2 or 2.1 model

parms.name: network_module
parms.help: Module

parms.name: mem_eff_attn
parms.help: Use memory efficient attention for CrossAttention (when no xformers)

parms.name: xformers
parms.help: Use xformers for Cross Attention

parms.name: use_8bit_adam
parms.help: Use 8 bit Adam for training

parms.name: seed
parms.help: Random seed for training

parms.name: mixed_precision
parms.help: Use mixed precision

parms.name: clip_skip
parms.help: Use output of nth layer from back of text encoder (n>=1)

parms.name: lowram
parms.help: Enable low RAM optimization. e.g. load models to VRAM instead of RAM (for machines which have bigger VRAM than RAM such as Colab and Kaggle)

parms.name: gradient_checkpointing
parms.help: When on reduces VRAM usage but slows the speed.

parms.name: sample_every_n_steps
parms.help: Generate sample images every N steps

parms.name: sample_every_n_epochs
parms.help: Generate sample images every N epochs (overwrites n_steps)

parms.name: sample_prompts
parms.help: File for prompts to generate sample images

parms.name: sample_sampler
parms.help: Sampler (scheduler) type for sample images

parms.name: prior_loss_weight
parms.help: Loss weight for regularization images

parms.name: caption_extension
parms.help: Extension of caption files

parms.name: resolution
parms.help: Resolution for training ('size' or 'width,height'). Must be divisible by 64

parms.name: cache_latents
parms.help: Cache latents to main memory to reduce VRAM usage.

parms.name: cache_latents_to_disk
parms.help: Cache latents to disk to reduce VRAM usage.

parms.name: enable_bucket
parms.help: Enable buckets for multi aspect ratio training

parms.name: min_bucket_reso
parms.help: Minimum resolution for buckets

parms.name: max_bucket_reso
parms.help: Maximum resolution for buckets

parms.name: bucket_reso_steps
parms.help: Steps of resolution for buckets, divisible by 8 is recommended

parms.name: bucket_no_upscale
parms.help: Make bucket for each image without upscaling

parms.name: max_data_loader_n_workers
parms.help: Max num workers for DataLoader (lower is less main RAM usage, faster epoch start and slower data loading)
